Articles.Content: I just bought this game a few days ago and I'm having some trouble getting a working rocket. Can you all pls post some pictures of some working rockets and maybe some tips pls thx in advance for any help
You should have some working rockets in the game if you have the latest version.
You should check out the spacecraft exchange section, there are lots of rockets there. Plus, you can click on my sig for some rockets too.

Hi policeiu, welcome to the community

As Nibb31 says, the current alpha has a few rockets, though 3 are not capable of reaching orbit, the Kerbal X should be fine.

Here is a craft I made for getting to the Mun and back, just save the text as a .craft file, have fun

i had the demo of the game which is .13 i think i had a design that was able to get into orbit lol i was just able to replicate it and get into a steady orbit thx a lot for all the help u all did give

Here's some rockets me and my friends made.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/16339-Voyager-Labs-Aeronautics-and-Space-Administration-%28OFFICIALLY-ACCEPTING-ANY-ORDER%29
